Chill Guesthouse was our first accommodation in Vietnam and the Guesthouse was more than we expected. The room was very clean and big. The owners were so friendly and were able to give us a lot of information. We booked a tour for the next day. On the next day we could visit the floating market and other attractions with our lovely guide Lily from the guesthouse. She gave us a lot of information and told us stories about the Vietnamese culture. In the evening Lily did a food tour with us where we could try different tasty Vietnamese dishes. She has good taste and can satisfy your needs. In the evening we could chill on the beautiful roof terrace with the owner couple and enjoyed the dessert. They also helped us to organize the bus ticket to Ho Chi Minh and gave us many recommendations. We had an unforgettable experience at the Chill Guesthouse and would highly recommend this guesthouse to anyone.
